name: Dig or die (itch)
description:
Dig or die, an old school inspired game where you have to survive the longest!

This game was made for the Tri Jam 24 and was succesfully developped in only 3 hours ! It is hardcoded jn JavaScript with the help of the p5.js library. 

Controls are simple, it's the mouse / touchscreen: you just have to click on the quartz to grapple your way around the underground ( inspired by gold digger ) while avoiding black bombs. Have fun!

Thanks again to p5.js for their awesome library
